report.title: List of locations for downloading pollinator areas
report.description: Full data of pollinator areas designed for explore.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l -- Not private LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vp ON vp.location_id=l.id AND vp.location_attribute_id=257 AND vp.deleted=false AND vp.int_value=1 -- Checked LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vchk on vchk.location_id=l.id and vchk.location_attribute_id=256 and vchk.deleted=false -- Email LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vemail on vemail.location_id=l.id and vemail.location_attribute_id=15 and vemail.deleted=false -- First name LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vfn on vfn.location_id=l.id and vfn.location_attribute_id=5 and vfn.deleted=false -- Last name LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vln on vln.location_id=l.id and vln.location_attribute_id=11 and vln.deleted=false -- Site type LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vst on vst.location_id=l.id and vst.location_attribute_id=249 and vst.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tst on tst.id=vst.int_value -- Seed mix LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vsm on vsm.location_id=l.id and vsm.location_attribute_id=252 and vsm.deleted=false -- Your site LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vys on vys.location_id=l.id and vys.location_attribute_id=254 and vys.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tys on tys.id=vys.int_value -- Confirmation of accuracy LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vca on vys.location_id=l.id and vca.location_attribute_id=255 and vca.deleted=false -- Privacy option LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vpo on vys.location_id=l.id and vpo.location_attribute_id=257 and vpo.deleted=false -- Terms accepted LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vta on vys.location_id=l.id and vta.location_attribute_id=261 and vta.deleted=false -- JBC JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false AND lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) -- Activity LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vact ON vact.location_id=l.id AND vact.location_attribute_id=251 AND vact.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms tact ON tact.id=vact.int_value -- Date of planting LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values vpd ON vpd.location_id=l.id AND vpd.location_attribute_id=260 AND vpd.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false #filters#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: island
param.join: JOIN locations lfilt ON st_intersects(lfilt.boundary_geom, COALESCE(l.boundary_geom, l.centroid_geom)) AND lfilt.id=#island#

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

column.name: private
column.sql: case when vp.id is not null and vp.int_value=1 then 'yes' else 'no' end

column.name: checked
column.sql: case when vchk.id is not null and vchk.int_value=1 then 'yes' else 'no' end
